episode_event_hisui_01/4001_1001_0100_10: Professor Bellis! Something terrible is happening—
episode_event_hisui_01/4001_1001_0400_10: When you say terrible, do you mean...?
episode_event_hisui_01/4001_1001_0500_10:
There was a report of a strange phenomenon in
the sky last night, above the forest on Pasio’s
outskirts. Is that what you’re referring to?
episode_event_hisui_01/4001_1001_0600_10:
From what I’ve heard, people are seeing what
appears to be a rift in the sky.
episode_event_hisui_01/4001_1001_0800_10:
Dialga’s been acting weird since last night,
when the phenomenon was first reported.
I wonder what’s going on...
episode_event_hisui_01/4001_1001_1100_10: There was another commotion in town, too!
episode_event_hisui_01/4001_1001_1200_10:
I heard that some people were making a fuss
about Dialga and Palkia.
episode_event_hisui_01/6801_1001_0100_10: Everything we see and hear is new and surprising.
episode_event_hisui_01/6801_1001_0200_10:
Yep! I guess I’ll have to learn how people and
Pokémon on Pasio get along!
episode_event_hisui_01/4002_1001_0200_10: We’ve obviously come to the future!
episode_event_hisui_01/4002_1001_0300_10:
This has to be a trial from mighty Dialga, who
controls time!
episode_event_hisui_01/4002_1001_0400_10:
Hmph, doubtful. Do you have any proof we’re in
the future?
episode_event_hisui_01/4002_1001_0500_10:
This is clearly a faraway country across the sea!
Which means it’s a trial from mighty Palkia, who
controls space!
episode_event_hisui_01/4002_1001_0600_10: Er... Are those the people you were talking about?
episode_event_hisui_01/4002_1001_1200_10: I’m so glad you’re here! I thought we were alone!
episode_event_hisui_01/4002_1001_1400_10:
Why are you wearing different clothes? What
happened to your Survey Corps uniform?
episode_event_hisui_01/4002_1001_1700_10: Hey, don’t tell me you forgot this handsome face.
episode_event_hisui_01/4002_1001_1800_10: Now’s not the time for bad jokes.
episode_event_hisui_01/4002_1001_2000_10: These two really might be different.
episode_event_hisui_01/4002_1001_2200_10:
They look similar to Rei and Akari, but
their mannerisms are completely different.
episode_event_hisui_01/4002_1001_2300_10:
Now that you mention it, they kinda are,
aren’t they.
episode_event_hisui_01/4002_1001_2600_10: My name’s Lucas. Nice to meet you.
episode_event_hisui_01/4002_1001_2700_10: So in short, these two aren’t who we thought.
episode_event_hisui_01/4002_1001_2900_10: Then I suppose introductions are in order.
episode_event_hisui_01/4002_1001_3000_10: I’m Irida, leader of the Pearl Clan in Hisui.
episode_event_hisui_01/4002_1001_3200_10:
I’m Adaman, leader of the Diamond Clan. I’m also
from Hisui.
episode_event_hisui_01/4002_1001_3300_10: Sorry for getting ahead of myself earlier.
episode_event_hisui_01/4002_1001_3400_10: I-it’s OK. Nice to meet you.
episode_event_hisui_01/4002_1001_3500_10: But...Hisui? I haven’t heard of that region before.
episode_event_hisui_01/4002_1001_3800_10: Well... Y’see, Dawn, the Hisui region...
episode_event_hisui_01/4002_1001_3900_10:
is what the Sinnoh region used to be called a
long time ago!
episode_event_hisui_01/4003_1001_0100_10: Lucas! Are you serious? Hisui is ancient Sinnoh?
episode_event_hisui_01/4003_1001_0200_10:
Yeah. It was in books in the Canalave Library
and in Professor Rowan’s research materials.
episode_event_hisui_01/4003_1001_0300_10: A long time ago, Sinnoh used to be called Hisui.
episode_event_hisui_01/4003_1001_0400_10: Which means, if what these people say is true...
episode_event_hisui_01/4003_1001_0600_10: See? I told you we came to the future.
episode_event_hisui_01/4003_1001_0800_10: This must be a trial from mighty Dialga!
episode_event_hisui_01/4003_1001_1000_10: Um, what exactly do you mean by “trial”?
episode_event_hisui_01/4003_1001_1100_10:
The Diamond Clan I lead is a group that worships
mighty Dialga, who controls time.
episode_event_hisui_01/4003_1001_1200_10:
We give our thanks for the time it’s bestowed upon
our world.
episode_event_hisui_01/4003_1001_1300_10:
In other words, the fact that time sped up and led
us here to the future...
episode_event_hisui_01/4003_1001_1400_10: means this is a trial from mighty Dialga!
episode_event_hisui_01/4003_1001_1600_10:
The Pearl Clan, which I lead, worships mighty
Palkia, who controls space.
episode_event_hisui_01/4003_1001_1700_10:
I was so sure it was mighty Palkia who led us to
this distant, foreign land, by manipulating space!
episode_event_hisui_01/4003_1001_1800_10:
So...before you got here, did the two of you meet
up with Dialga?
episode_event_hisui_01/4003_1001_1900_10: Now that you mention it, I don’t remember.
episode_event_hisui_01/4003_1001_2000_10:
Actually, Irida and I are fuzzy on what happened
just before and after we arrived here.
episode_event_hisui_01/4003_1001_2100_10:
If that’s the case, it’ll be hard to tell if this was
really Dialga’s doing.
episode_event_hisui_01/4003_1001_2200_10: I agree. It’s still too early to draw any conclusions.
episode_event_hisui_01/4003_1001_2300_10:
Traveling to an unknown world in a
distant time...
episode_event_hisui_01/4003_1001_2400_10: I never thought it would happen to us.
episode_event_hisui_01/4003_1001_2500_10: Me neither. Not even an inkling.
episode_event_hisui_01/4003_1001_2700_10: Back in Hisui, where we were before...
episode_event_hisui_01/4003_1001_2800_10:
There were some people who went through what
we are now.
episode_event_hisui_01/4003_1001_2900_10:
Apparently, they suddenly fell from the sky one
day. And if I remember correctly...
episode_event_hisui_01/4003_1001_3000_10: That’s it! It was from a rift!
episode_event_hisui_01/4003_1001_3100_10: There was a rift when we showed up here, too!
episode_event_hisui_01/4003_1001_3200_10:
Right! Why didn’t I realize it sooner! I’m such
a fool!
episode_event_hisui_01/4003_1001_3300_10: Oh, so if you came from a rift, that must mean...
episode_event_hisui_01/4003_1001_3400_10:
See that over there? That’s what we’re
talking about.
episode_event_hisui_01/4003_1001_3500_10:
That’s the rift in the sky Professor Bellis was
talking about!
episode_event_hisui_01/4004_1001_0100_10:
Back in Hisui, there was a rift similar to the
one here...
episode_event_hisui_01/4004_1001_0200_10: So the rest of you came, too!
episode_event_hisui_01/4004_1001_0300_10:
Are those two the ones everyone’s been
talking about?
episode_event_hisui_01/4004_1001_0400_10: Yes! Their names are Adaman and Irida!
episode_event_hisui_01/4004_1001_0500_10: Professor, have you learned anything new?
episode_event_hisui_01/4004_1001_0600_10: Yes, but I have some bad news.
episode_event_hisui_01/4004_1001_0700_10:
Strange phenomena, including this rift, have been
occurring across Pasio...
episode_event_hisui_01/4004_1001_0800_10:
And it seems a lot of wild Pokémon are suddenly
appearing where these phenomena are occurring.
episode_event_hisui_01/4004_1001_0900_10: Do you think this could be...
episode_event_hisui_01/4004_1001_1100_10: Oh, you know something about it?
episode_event_hisui_01/4004_1001_1200_10:
Yeah. It’s a dangerous phenomenon that sometimes
occurred back in Hisui.
episode_event_hisui_01/4004_1001_1300_10:
An unusual amount of wild Pokémon start to
appear within the area it affects.
episode_event_hisui_01/4004_1001_1400_10:
We don’t know when or where a distortion will
appear, but the ones in Hisui would always
naturally dissipate after a while.
episode_event_hisui_01/4004_1001_1500_10: Does that mean the ones on Pasio will, too?
episode_event_hisui_01/4004_1001_1600_10: No, I’m afraid the ones on Pasio...
episode_event_hisui_01/4004_1001_1700_10:
aren’t showing signs of disappearing. In fact,
they’re getting bigger.
episode_event_hisui_01/4004_1001_1900_10:
Dangerous? I know there haven’t been any wild
Pokémon on Pasio before...
episode_event_hisui_01/4004_1001_2000_10:
But if it’s just a lot of Pokémon showing up, that’s
not exactly scary, right?
episode_event_hisui_01/4004_1001_2200_10: I see. So that’s how you perceive it.
episode_event_hisui_01/4004_1001_2300_10: We don’t keep our Pokémon in balls...
episode_event_hisui_01/4004_1001_2500_10:
If I remember correctly...back in the time of Hisui,
Poké Balls weren’t very common, right?
episode_event_hisui_01/4004_1001_2600_10: Correct. Only some folks use Poké Balls.
episode_event_hisui_01/4004_1001_2700_10:
In the time we’re from, aside from those raised
among humans...
episode_event_hisui_01/4004_1001_2800_10:
Pokémon are considered dangerous, frightening
creatures that shouldn’t be underestimated.
episode_event_hisui_01/4004_1001_3300_10:
Wild Pokémon attacked someone who entered a
distortion’s vicinity.
episode_event_hisui_01/4004_1001_3500_10:
There are a lot of non-Trainer civilians on Pasio.
That must be why...
episode_event_hisui_01/4004_1001_3600_10:
Come to think of it, before I became a Trainer,
adults used to warn me...
episode_event_hisui_01/4004_1001_3800_10:
Yeah. You shouldn’t underestimate
Pokémon’s strength.
episode_event_hisui_01/4004_1001_3900_10:
We need to stop this at once, before this causes
even more trouble!
episode_event_hisui_01/4004_1001_4100_10:
If you plan on doing something about the
distortion, we might be able to help.
episode_event_hisui_01/4004_1001_4300_10:
By the way, this rift in space-time we were
talking about earlier...
episode_event_hisui_01/4004_1001_4400_10:
When it appeared in Hisui, mighty Dialga and
Palkia were a major cause.
episode_event_hisui_01/4004_1001_4500_10:
The rift is also what started all the strange things
back in Hisui, too, like the distortions.
episode_event_hisui_01/4004_1001_4600_10:
There’s a chance the disturbances occurring on
Pasio are connected to mighty Dialga and Palkia...
episode_event_hisui_01/4004_1001_4700_10: If so, we’ll have Dialga help us!
episode_event_hisui_01/4004_1001_4900_10:
W-wow! I wasn’t expecting to witness
mighty Dialga!
episode_event_hisui_01/4004_1001_5100_10:
But if mighty Dialga is already helping humans in
this time, fixing this should go smoothly!
episode_event_hisui_01/4004_1001_5200_10:
Hey, if Dialga is here, then what about
mighty Palkia?
episode_event_hisui_01/4004_1001_5400_10: There is a Trainer with a Palkia, but...
episode_event_hisui_01/4004_1001_5500_10:
Really? Then let’s go ask mighty Palkia for help
as well!
episode_event_hisui_01/4004_1001_5800_10: Is there a reason why it’d be difficult?
episode_event_hisui_01/4004_1001_5900_10:
C’mon, we can’t be indecisive! We don’t have
much time!
episode_event_hisui_01/4004_1001_6200_10: Yeah. It might not work, but we should at least try!
episode_event_hisui_01/4004_1001_6300_10: Let’s go find Cyrus—of Team Galactic!
episode_event_hisui_01/4005_1001_0100_10:
I don’t know what you’re worried about, but it’ll
be fine!
episode_event_hisui_01/4005_1001_0200_10: The Galaxy Team will surely lend us a hand!
episode_event_hisui_01/4005_1001_0300_10:
Um...I don’t think we’re talking about the same
people...
episode_event_hisui_01/4005_1001_0400_10:
You! You’re here to get in our way again,
aren’t you!
episode_event_hisui_01/4005_1001_1000_10: Arezu! What are you doing in that outfit?!
episode_event_hisui_01/4005_1001_1200_10:
I’m Mars, one of the commanders of Team
Galactic. Can you handle my beauty and strength?
episode_event_hisui_01/4005_1001_1300_10:
How rude of you to mistake a Team Galactic
commander for someone else!
episode_event_hisui_01/4005_1001_1400_10:
Oh...so this is just another case of people
looking alike?
episode_event_hisui_01/4005_1001_1600_10: Um, we’re not here to stop your plans or anything!
episode_event_hisui_01/4005_1001_1700_10:
We just want to ask Cyrus and Palkia for their
help in fixing the disturbances happening on Pasio!
episode_event_hisui_01/4005_1001_1800_10:
Hmph. Bold of you to ask, but I suppose we could
entertain the idea.
episode_event_hisui_01/4005_1001_1900_10:
Team Galactic has suffered damage due to
the disturbances.
episode_event_hisui_01/4005_1001_2000_10:
This could benefit Master Cyrus, so we’ll hear you
out. But don’t you dare try anything funny!
episode_event_hisui_01/4006_1001_0100_10: Um, so the reason why we’re here is—
episode_event_hisui_01/4006_1001_0300_10: I already know why you’re here.
episode_event_hisui_01/4006_1001_0400_10:
However, I have no intention of cooperating with
the likes of you.
episode_event_hisui_01/4006_1001_0600_10:
The Galaxy Team’s mission is for people and
Pokémon to coexist for the peace and safety of the
world, right?
episode_event_hisui_01/4006_1001_0700_10:
I don’t know what organization you’re mistaking
us for, but Team Galactic has one mission—
episode_event_hisui_01/4006_1001_0900_10:
I guess Team Galactic is different from the Galaxy
Team we know.
episode_event_hisui_01/4006_1001_1000_10:
If you’re hoping for goodwill, leave now. You
won’t find such ambiguous things here.
episode_event_hisui_01/4006_1001_1200_10: Yeah, it reminds me of someone...
episode_event_hisui_01/4006_1001_1800_10:
My head... Mighty Dialga’s talking...inside
my head!
episode_event_hisui_01/4006_1001_1900_10:
It’s telling me to use the power of time and space
to ease the space-time distortion...
episode_event_hisui_01/4006_1001_2000_10:
Mighty Palkia is telling me that we can stop the
space-time distortion from spreading by
working together!
episode_event_hisui_01/4006_1001_2100_10: Dialga and Palkia are speaking to you?
episode_event_hisui_01/4006_1001_2300_10:
However, it does coincide with some of Team
Galactic’s research.
episode_event_hisui_01/4006_1001_2600_10:
If a large number of wild Pokémon are appearing
in this phenomenon’s vicinity...
episode_event_hisui_01/4006_1001_2700_10:
I can hypothesize it’s because various times and
spaces are connected.
episode_event_hisui_01/4006_1001_2800_10: If we assume your hypothesis is correct...
episode_event_hisui_01/4006_1001_2900_10:
There’s a chance the disturbances are forming
because the balance between time and space
has been disrupted.
episode_event_hisui_01/4006_1001_3000_10:
If so, we might be able to use the power of time
and space to restore balance and stop
the distortions!
episode_event_hisui_01/4006_1001_3200_10:
What do you think, as one who has a connection
to mighty Palkia?
episode_event_hisui_01/4006_1001_3400_10:
I’m curious whether this will prove my hypothesis
correct—and what the results will show.
episode_event_hisui_01/4006_1001_3500_10:
Excellent! With mighty Palkia’s cooperation,
I’m much more confident this will go well!
episode_event_hisui_01/4006_1001_3700_10:
Within the distortion, wild Pokémon will become
an obstacle.
episode_event_hisui_01/4006_1001_3800_10:
It would be more effective, then, to apply force
from outside the distortion, in a pincer movement.
episode_event_hisui_01/4006_1001_3900_10:
So we’ll have mighty Palkia and Dialga working
from opposite sides of the distortion.
episode_event_hisui_01/4006_1001_4100_10: Let’s split up and get started!
episode_event_hisui_01/4007_1001_0100_10:
OK! Time to call upon mighty Dialga to lend us
its power!
episode_event_hisui_01/4007_1001_0200_10: Dialga... Can you help us, please?
episode_event_hisui_01/4008_1001_0100_10: Hey... The distortion seems to be getting bigger...
episode_event_hisui_01/4008_1001_0200_10:
Why? How could this happen when mighty Palkia
is trying to stop it?
episode_event_hisui_01/4008_1001_0600_10: No, wait! The distortion stopped growing!
episode_event_hisui_01/4008_1001_0700_10: And...it looks like it’s coming to an end!
episode_event_hisui_01/4008_1001_0800_10:
I knew you could do it, mighty Palkia!
Your power worked!
episode_event_hisui_01/4008_1001_0900_10:
(There was a third power at work here, from that
reverse world that doesn’t follow the laws
of physics...)
episode_event_hisui_01/4009_1001_0100_10: We did it! It’s getting smaller and smaller!
episode_event_hisui_01/4009_1001_0300_10:
I have a lot of questions for those two Professor
Bellis mentioned, who everyone’s talking about!
episode_event_hisui_01/4010_1001_0100_10: W-we did it! The space-time distortion is gone!
episode_event_hisui_01/4010_1001_0400_10:
You’re a lifesaver, Dialga! It’s all thanks to you
lending us your power!
episode_event_hisui_01/4010_1001_0500_10:
(Once again, people and Pokémon
joined together...)
episode_event_hisui_01/4010_1001_0700_10: Looks like it’s time for us to make a decision.
episode_event_hisui_01/4011_1001_0200_10: Huh? The rift is still open?
episode_event_hisui_01/4011_1001_0300_10:
And you’re saying more space-time distortions
have been forming, too?!
episode_event_hisui_01/4011_1001_0400_10: Occasionally, yes. But on a smaller scale.
episode_event_hisui_01/4011_1001_0500_10: So we didn’t fix the root of the problem...
episode_event_hisui_01/4011_1001_0600_10:
Don’t worry. We were able to stop the worst of it,
weren’t we?
episode_event_hisui_01/4011_1001_0700_10:
If anything happens again, I’m sure we can
resolve it together.
episode_event_hisui_01/4011_1001_0800_10:
Huh? But I thought you two wanted to get back
home as soon as possible.
episode_event_hisui_01/4011_1001_0900_10: Well...we do, but we don’t know how.
episode_event_hisui_01/4011_1001_1000_10:
So for now, we’ve decided to stay here on Pasio
until we figure it out!
episode_event_hisui_01/4011_1001_1100_10:
Other people and Pokémon from Hisui might come
here, too...
episode_event_hisui_01/4011_1001_1200_10:
So we’ll be sure to take care of them if they do.
Leave it to us!
episode_event_hisui_01/4011_1001_1400_10: Yeah. Our minds are made up.
episode_event_hisui_01/4011_1001_1500_10:
As proof of how serious we are, we even have
Leafeon and Glaceon in Poké Balls now.
episode_event_hisui_01/4011_1001_1600_10:
When someone from Hisui comes here, or when
we eventually find our way back there...
episode_event_hisui_01/4011_1001_1700_10:
We’ll have to set the example and show them how
people and Pokémon can live together in harmony.
episode_event_hisui_01/4011_1001_1800_10: Sync pairs are the perfect example!
episode_event_hisui_01/4011_1001_1900_10: So please, let us stay and learn from all of you!
episode_event_hisui_01/4011_1001_2100_10: *chuckle* I can tell it’s going to get lively here.
episode_event_hisui_01/4011_1001_2200_10: Let’s give it our best, Adaman, Irida!
episode_event_hisui_01/4011_1001_2300_10:
You got it! Since we’ll be here a while, let’s help
each other out!
